com.linecorp.armeria.server

Interface ServiceCodec.DecodeResult

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceCodec.DefaultDecodeResult
    Enclosing interface:
    ServiceCodec

    public static interface ServiceCodec.DecodeResult
    The result of ServiceCodec.decodeRequest().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ServiceCodec.DecodeResult NOT_FOUND
      The singleton whose type() is ServiceCodec.DecodeResultType.NOT_FOUND.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Throwable cause()
      Returns the cause of the decode failure.
      Optional<String> decodedInvocationId()
      Returns the ID of the invocation.
      Optional<String> decodedMethod()
      Returns the name of the method being invoked.
      Optional<List<Object>> decodedParams()
      Returns the list of the invocation parameters.
      SerializationFormat decodedSerializationFormat()
      Returns the serialization format of the invocation.
      Object errorResponse()
      Returns the error response to send to the client.
      ServiceInvocationContext invocationContext()
      Returns the ServiceInvocationContext created as a result of ServiceCodec.decodeRequest().
      ServiceCodec.DecodeResultType type()
      Returns the type of this result.

    • Field Detail

      • NOT_FOUND

        static final ServiceCodec.DecodeResult NOT_FOUND
        The singleton whose type() is ServiceCodec.DecodeResultType.NOT_FOUND.

    • Method Detail

      • type

        ServiceCodec.DecodeResultType type()
        Returns the type of this result.

      • invocationContext

        ServiceInvocationContext invocationContext()
        Returns the ServiceInvocationContext created as a result of ServiceCodec.decodeRequest().
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the decode result is not successful

      • errorResponse

        Object errorResponse()
        Returns the error response to send to the client.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the decode result is successful and thus no error response is available

      • cause

        Throwable cause()
        Returns the cause of the decode failure.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the decode result is successful and thus there is no error to report

      • decodedSerializationFormat

        SerializationFormat decodedSerializationFormat()
        Returns the serialization format of the invocation.

      • decodedInvocationId

        Optional<String> decodedInvocationId()
        Returns the ID of the invocation.

      • decodedMethod

        Optional<String> decodedMethod()
        Returns the name of the method being invoked.

      • decodedParams

        Optional<List<Object>> decodedParams()
        Returns the list of the invocation parameters.
